original_text: For who hath stood in the counsel of the Lord, and hath perceived and heard his word? who hath marked his word, and heard it?
korean_text: 누가 여호와의 회의에 참여하여 그 말을 알아들었으며 누가 귀를 기울여 그 말을 들었느냐

sentences.original_text: For who hath stood in counsel of the Lord
and hath perceived and heard his word?

sentences.korean_translation: 누가 그의 말씀을 주의 깊게 살폈으며
